Name: Auto Update Criteria
Description: Turn on to update search results automatically

Name: The prefix added to the Summary field of cloned issues
Date Picker Format (Java)
Description: This part is only for the Java (server side) generated dates. Note that this should correspond to the javascript date picker format (jira.date.picker.javascript.format) setting.

Name: Date Picker Format (JavaScript)
Description: This part is only for the JavaScript (client side) generated dates. Note that this should correspond to the java date picker format (jira.date.picker.java.format) setting.

Name: DateTime Picker Format (Java)
Description: This part is only for the Java (server side) generated datetimes. Note that this should correspond to the javascript datetime picker format (jira.date.time.picker.javascript.format) setting.

Name: DateTime Picker Format (JavaScript)
Description: This part is only for the JavaScript (client side) generated date times. Note that this should correspond to the java datetime picker format (jira.date.time.picker.java.format) setting.

Name: JIRA issue actions order
Description: The default order of actions (tab items like 'Comments', 'Change History' etc) on the 'View Issue' screen, by date, from top to bottom.

Name: Use ISO8601 standard in Date Picker
Description: Turning it on will cause Monday to be the first day of week in the Date Picker, as specified by the ISO8601 standard

Name: Background
Description: The background color of the main navigation bar

Name: Highlight
Description: The color of the create button and highlight color for the selected navigation item

Name: Sort order for view issue links
Description: Specifies the sort order of the issue links on the 'View Issue' screen.

Name: jira.comment.collapsing.minimum.hidden
Description: The minimum number of comments needing to be hidden for comment collapsing to occur. 0 means there will be no comment collapsing.

Name: Delay in days before newsletter signup tip is shown
Description: The number of days before a prompt to sign up to the Jira Insiders newsletter is shown. A value of -1 disables this functionality.

Name: Indicate whether or not to expose product suggestions for other Atlassian Products within JIRA
jira.explicit.field.association.feature.enabled
Description: When false, disables explicit field association for all TMP projects.
